data.text: @HQwertz1 @SueToumi @kegill @USMortality Just remember, in the US 1 dose and 2 doses 14 days or earlier is considered unvaccinated. I wonder what the difference would be? Because UK data shows all doses and it’s widely different.

@kegill @USMortality @BeeLineBlog Negative. At my workplace about 20 out of 300+ total are not vaccinated over the last 4mo or so none of the unvaccinated have tested positive, yet unvaccinated have to test weekly. The vast majority of the vaccinated have been positive, yet they don’t have to test. Irony.
@USMortality @aaronwall Do one per state and majority😬

@kegill @USMortality 96% of all adults in NYC have had at least one dose of the vaccine.
Mask mandates in place for almost 2 years.
Vaccine passports in place for those age 5+.
Yes, deaths are up in NYC in Jan, '22 vs. Jan. '21 because of antivaxxers and antimaskers.
It all lines up.
@USMortality @aginnt All the side effects of the shots with 0% benefit…

@kegill @USMortality Does the truth scare you that much? Most people around the world in ICU wards are vaxed. The unvaxed have long since got herd immunity. Their uncompromised immune systems are doing the job. Booster 4 soon?

@USMortality @BeeLineBlog BECAUSE OF ANTIVAXXERS AND ANTIMASKERS.

Which are you?
